Title: Jungle 2 Jungle
Writer: Hervé Palud (earlier screenplay Un indien dans la ville), Thierry Lhermitte (earlier screenplay Un indien dans la ville), Jean-Marie Pallardy (earlier screenplay Un indien dans la ville), Philippe Bruneau (earlier screenplay Un indien dans la ville), Bruce A. Evans (screenplay), Raynold Gideon (screenplay)
Actors: Tim Allen, Martin Short, JoBeth Williams, Lolita Davidovich
Plot: A man learns he has a thirteen-year-old son who was raised in the jungle and brings the boy to New York City, turning his life upside down in the process.
